mapper.select: select cnum, cyear, cround, clevel, TO_CHAR(docRegStart1,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as docRegStart1, TO_CHAR(docRegEnd1,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as docRegEnd1, TO_CHAR(docRegStart2,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as docRegStart2, TO_CHAR(docRegEnd2,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as docRegEnd2, TO_CHAR(docTestStart,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as docTestStart, TO_CHAR(docTestEnd,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as docTestEnd, TO_CHAR(docResultStart,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as docResultStart, TO_CHAR(docResultEnd,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as docResultEnd, TO_CHAR(docSubmitStart,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as docSubmitStart, TO_CHAR(docSubmitEnd,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as docSubmitEnd, TO_CHAR(pracRegStart1,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as pracRegStart1, TO_CHAR(pracRegEnd1,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as pracRegEnd1, TO_CHAR(pracRegStart2,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as pracRegStart2, TO_CHAR(pracRegEnd2,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as pracRegEnd2, TO_CHAR(pracTestStart,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as pracTestStart, TO_CHAR(pracTestEnd,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as pracTestEnd, TO_CHAR(pracResStart,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as pracResStart, TO_CHAR(pracResEnd,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as pracResEnd from certidate where cnum is null
